name: Notes (itch) (TheGreatGame)
description:
Mini Jam

The name of the game is called Notes. It’s pretty simple. All you need to do is tap the screen to change the ball’s gravity/direction.

Game Over Rules: Hitting the wall will end the game. 

Point Break Down:

  • White 0 points
  • Red +1 point
  • Blue +2 points
  • Green +3 points 

This game is all about timing :).. Enjoy and leave me some feedback will you.
